message: I propose dividing the money 3:2 in favor of Alice. Let me know if this works for you.
I think we can both do better than that. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. It's a fairer deal that accounts for the time lost in negotiation.
Considering the inflation and negotiation time, I propose a 55:45 split in favor of Bob. This balances fairness and efficiency.
